content:
Sure, here are six different scenarios that a guest commonly undergoes at a restaurant, listed as strings and stored in a Python list:
```python
restaurant_scenarios = [
    "Making a reservation",
    "Being seated at a table",
    "Ordering from the menu",
    "Waiting for food to be prepared and served",
    "Asking for the check and paying the bill",
    "Providing feedback or reviews"
]
```
